CHAT.comment: CHI and MIT are playing in the living room .

u.a: brings a loop of beads to MIT
puts the loop on CHI's head
points at a picture of a train
takes a container with magnet letters/numbers
walks to a closet with a metal door
takes the container to the closet
opens the door and looks inside
puts a number 8 on the door
puts the letter K on the door
puts the letter O on the door
turns over the container with the letters and numbers
finds a plastic dog among the letters and numbers
puts the letter 3 on the door
shows a piece of paper and a box of crayons on the table
shows the drawer of the table
takes the crayon box from MOT
opens a large sheet of paper
moves the paper shita that CHI does not draw on the table
tries to take out more crayons out of the box
draws circles on the eyes of the face
points at the circles CHI drew on the eyes
draws hair-like things on the face .
draws scribble all on the face
draws a line on the picture of an orange crayon on the box .
points at the orange crayon on the box
points at the orange crayon in CHI's hand
points at the crayon and the picture of a crayon on the box
draws, then hands MIT a yellow crayon
points at what CHI has just drawn
points at the blue crayon CHI is holding and the picture on the box
points at different crayons on the box
tries to draw on the table
draws a long line that goes off the paper
rubs off the crayon on the table
rubs the crayon off the table surface with tissue paper
rubs his drawing on the paper with the tissue
